using Oxygen.Editor.Data;
using Oxygen.Editor.Data.Settings;
using System;
using System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations;
using System.Runtime.CompilerServices;

#nullable enable

namespace Testing;
public sealed partial class TupleSettings
{
    /// <summary>
    /// Setting descriptors for TupleSettings properties.
    /// </summary>
    internal static class Descriptors
    {
        public static readonly SettingDescriptor<(int, string)> Pair = new()
        {
            Key = new SettingKey<(int, string)>(ModuleName, nameof(Pair)),
            DisplayName = null,
            Description = null,
            Category = null,
            Validators = new ValidationAttribute[] {  },
        };
    }
}

/// <summary>
/// Assembly-level module initializer that registers all descriptors for this assembly on load.
/// </summary>
file static class DescriptorsInitializer
{
    [System.Runtime.CompilerServices.ModuleInitializer]
    internal static void Initialize()
    {
        EditorSettingsManager.StaticProvider.Register(Testing.TupleSettings.Descriptors.Pair);
    }
}
